title.en: The Party Leader Who Will Be Made to Understand in 7 Days

altTitles.ja: 7日後にわからせられる党首くん

altTitles.ja-ro: 7 Nichi Go ni Wakara Serareru Toushu-kun

biography.en:
**Name In Native Language:** ウンポーコ (unpōko)

**Other Associated Names:**
unpocoooo
unpooko
unpoco

**Circle:** pocoration (ポーコレーション)
